column4: tcpdump -w tcpdump.log gives me packet data.. how to i get it to dump the output it shows to a log file.. only success i have had is tcpdump > tcpdump.log, but this doesn't actually dump to the log until i kill the command. anyone know tcpdump? better place to ask?
why not try wireshare or one  of the other guis out there?
there are ncurses guis too.. .. I've never used just plain tcpdump
